AppDup2Pattern.name: Approximate Duplicate based on two attributes
AppDup2Pattern.description: Check whether there are records that have the same value in two important attributes, suggesting that they describe the same real-world object.

AppDup3Pattern.name: Approximate Duplicate based on three attributes
AppDup3Pattern.description: Check whether there are records that have the same value in three important attributes, suggesting that they describe the same real-world object.

CardImpliesMandAttPattern.name: Mandatory Attribute based on Cardinality Constraint
CardImpliesMandAttPattern.description: Check whether a attribute exists, that is mandatory on specific cardinalities of a field.

CardPattern.name: Cardinality Constraint
CardPattern.description: Check, whether the occurence count of specific elements apply.

CardMatchPattern.name: Cardinality of RegEx-Constrained Values
CardMatchPattern.description: Check, whether the occurence count of specific elements, that match a regular expression apply.

CardIfCompSetPattern.name: If Property A in Set, Check Cardinality of Property B
CardIfCompSetPattern.description: If one specific property is in a specific Set, check the occurence count of another specific element applies

CardCompSetIfCompSetPattern.name: If Property A in Set, Check Cardinality of Property B in Set
CardCompSetIfCompSetPattern.description: If one specific property is in a specific Set, check the occurence count of values of another specific property, that are in another set

CheckFormatPattern.name: Check the format of a resource
CheckFormatPattern.description: Check if the ressource under an URL is of a specific format.

CompDatabasePattern.name: Fieldvalue in Database
CompDatabasePattern.description: Check whether all values in a field are in a database.

CompPattern.name: Comparison Pattern
CompPattern.description: Check, whether the occurence count of specific elements apply.

CompSetPattern.name: Comparison Pattern with Set
CompSetPattern.description: Check, whether the value of fields are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompSetIsoPattern.name: Comparison Pattern with Set (Isolated)
CompSetIsoPattern.description: Check, whether the value of fields are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompSetSinPattern.name: Comparison Pattern with Set (Single)
CompSetSinPattern.description: Check, whether the value of fields are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompSetAnyPattern.name: Comparison Pattern Any in Set
CompSetAnyPattern.description: Check, whether at least one value of fields are within a list of allowed (/forbidden) terms.

CompValAnyPattern.name: Compare values within a record
CompValAnyPattern.description: Check whether any value of a specific field within a record does comply to a value restriction.

CompValPattern.name: Compare Values
CompValPattern.description: Check whether all values of a specific field within a record does comply to a value restriction.

ContainsPattern.name: Contains Check
ContainsPattern.description: Check, whether a value contains a specific substring.

ContainsIsoPattern.name: Contains Check (Isolated)
ContainsIsoPattern.description: Check, whether a value contains a specific substring.

ContainsSinPattern.name: Contains Check (Single)
ContainsSinPattern.description: Check, whether a value contains a specific substring.

ContainsListPattern.name: Contains List Check
ContainsListPattern.description: Check, whether a value contains one of a list of substrings.

ContainsListIsoPattern.name: Contains List Check (Isolated)
ContainsListIsoPattern.description: Check, whether a value contains one of a list of substrings.

ContainsListSinPattern.name: Contains List Check (Single)
ContainsListSinPattern.description: Check, whether a value contains one of a list of substrings.

DupValPattern.name: Duplicate value
DupValPattern.description: Check whether a record has the same value in two distinct fields.

FuncPattern.name: Functional Dependency Constraint
FuncPattern.description: Validate a dependency between two subordinate fields is valid in comparison to data records next to it.

LocalUniquePattern.name: Local Unique Attribute Constraint
LocalUniquePattern.description: Check whether all field values are unique within a record.

MandAttPattern.name: Mandatory Attribute
MandAttPattern.description: Check whether a record has a mandatory field.

MandElePattern.name: Mandatory Element
MandElePattern.description: Check whether a record has a mandatory element.

MandContPattern.name: Mandatory Content
MandContPattern.description: Check whether an element has mandatory content.

MandContIsoPattern.name: Mandatory Content (Isolated)
MandContIsoPattern.description: Check whether an element has mandatory content.

MandContSinPattern.name: Mandatory Content (Single)
MandContSinPattern.description: Check whether an element has mandatory content.

MandContAndPattern.name: Two Mandatory Contents
MandContAndPattern.description: Check whether an element has mandatory content.

MandContAndIsoPattern.name: Two Mandatory Contents (Isolated)
MandContAndIsoPattern.description: Check whether an element has mandatory content.

MandContAndSinPattern.name: Two Mandatory Contents (Single)
MandContAndSinPattern.description: Check whether an element has mandatory content.

MatchPattern.name: Regular Expression Check
MatchPattern.description: Check, whether a value matches a specific regular expression.

MatchIsoPattern.name: Regular Expression Check (Isolated)
MatchIsoPattern.description: Check, whether a value matches a specific regular expression.

MatchSinPattern.name: Regular Expression Check (Single)
MatchSinPattern.description: Check, whether a value matches a specific regular expression.

MatchListPattern.name: Regular Expression List Check
MatchListPattern.description: Check, whether a value matches at least one regular expression from a list.

MatchListIsoPattern.name: Regular Expression List Check (Isolated)
MatchListIsoPattern.description: Check, whether a value matches at least one regular expression from a list.

MatchListSinPattern.name: Regular Expression List Check (Single)
MatchListSinPattern.description: Check, whether a value matches at least one regular expression from a list.

StringLengthPattern.name: String value length restriction
StringLengthPattern.description: Check whether all field values comply to the length restriction.

StringLengthIsoPattern.name: String value length restriction (Isolated)
StringLengthIsoPattern.description: Check all field values whether they comply to the length restriction.

StringLengthSinPattern.name: String value length restriction (Single)
StringLengthSinPattern.description: Check all field values whether they comply to the length restriction.

StringLengthRangePattern.name: String value length range restriction
StringLengthRangePattern.description: Check all field values whether they comply to the length restriction.

StringLengthRangeIsoPattern.name: String value length range restriction (Isolated)
StringLengthRangeIsoPattern.description: Check all field values whether they comply to the length restriction.

StringLengthRangeSinPattern.name: String value length range restriction (Single)
StringLengthRangeSinPattern.description: Check all field values whether they comply to the length restriction.

UniquePattern.name: Uniqueness Constraint
UniquePattern.description: Check, whether a value is unique within the dataset.

ValidLinkPattern.name: Valid Link
ValidLinkPattern.description: Check that a record contains no field with an invalid link.

ValidLinkIsoPattern.name: Valid Link (Isolated)
ValidLinkIsoPattern.description: Check whether a field is an valid link.

ValidLinkSinPattern.name: Valid Link (Single)
ValidLinkSinPattern.description: Check whether a field is an valid link.
